word_mean: 〔NA〕半球，半球样结构：例如大脑半球或小脑半球

sentence.Network_en: This animal is to be found only in the Southern Hemisphere.
sentence.Network_cn: 这种动物只有在南半球才能找到.

sentence.Network_en: Your left cerebral hemisphere controls the right - hand side of your body.
sentence.Network_cn: 你的左半脑控制身体的右半身.

sentence.Network_en: They say God spoke to them and told them to go on a mission to the poorest country in the Western Hemisphere.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们说上帝让他们去西半球最贫困的国家传播教义。

list.abs: hemispherical dome 半球形圆顶hemispherical head 半球形顶盖hemogeneous radiation 单色辐射
...物。直径往往大于5毫米。由于从几千米的高空降落，冲击力极大，往往会损坏房屋庄稼人畜造成灾害。［12］北半球（northern hemisphere）赤道以北，夏至日（6月22日）白昼最长，冬至日（12月22日）白昼最短的半个地球。［15］.
小脑的中间部比较狭窄,蟠曲如环,称为小脑蚓(vermis);小脑蚓由前方的小结和后方的蚓垂及蚓锥体组成。两侧部庞大,称小脑半球(cerebellar hemisphere),在小脑的下面.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English (in the sense 'half the celestial sphere, the sky'): from Old French emisphere, via Latin from Greek hēmisphairion, from hēmi- 'half' + sphaira 'sphere'

entry.def: A hemisphere is one half of the earth.
A hemisphere is one half of the brain.

example.ex: In most people, the left hemisphere is bigger than the right.
example.tran: 多数人的左脑比右脑大。
